name: PuzzleoftheDay
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: puzzle of the day
des:
Puzzle of the Day is a daily crossword style puzzle game!

Instead of a typical crossword board, we take those clues and bring you themed 5 word puzzles, great for playing at any time of day. 

Since you don't get to cross the word together, you earn free letter reveals every time you solve a word that you can use on subsequent words. Pass and skip around to the other words if you are stuck.

Compete Online
By linking your account, you will be able to share your stats and compete on the live leaderboards at stokedskills.com/puzzleoftheday. By linking your account, we will show your first name and last initial on the leaderboards and top players each week will be accessible from within the game.

Submit your Own Puzzles
Most days our Puzzles are created by our in house Puzzle Maker Brad Wilber, who has designed and edited many New York Times crosswords. However every Thursday we feature a customer submitted puzzle! Submit your own puzzles here to have a chance of getting it features on an upcoming week. https://www.stokedskills.com/puzzleoftheday/submityourown

Puzzle League
Want to play more? For just a small monthly fee you can catch up on any puzzles you missed from the last ten days. And as an added bonus - you'll get extra letter reveals so you can complete all the puzzles! You'll also be able to reveal an entire word if you are stuck. 

Commands
Repeat - Repeat the clue
Pass - Pass to the next unsolved word
Go to word X - Go to a word you haven't solved yet
Reveal a letter - Reveals a letter in your current word
Reveal the word - Reveals the whole current word (no points awarded)
Give Up - Forfiets the current puzzle
Brief mode on - Turns on brief mode for shorter responses and smoother gameplay
Brief mode off - Turns off brief mode 

Leave us a Review!
If you like this game, we'd really appreciate a review. Any feedback really helps us as we constantly strive to improve the game for everyone. Feel free to reach out to contact@stokedskills.com as well!
